item.title: Contract positions are the perfect solution for companies in Singapore
item.description: A recent survey by Robert Walters, a global recruitment firm, indicates a rise in contract employment in Singapore. The Singapore Contracting Survey reveals that hiring managers are increasingly turning to skilled contract workers due to difficulties in obtaining approval for permanent positions. Many companies are implementing hiring freezes, often mandated by their headquarters, leading managers in Singapore to seek adaptable, temporary staffing solutions. The survey, which polled over 300 professionals in Singapore with contracting experience, explored the advantages and disadvantages of contract work.
